titles.title: Office of Special Counsel Reauthorization Act of 2017
Office of Special Counsel Reauthorization Act of 2017
Office of Special Counsel Reauthorization Act of 2017
Office of Special Counsel Reauthorization Act of 2017
Office of Special Counsel Reauthorization Act of 2017
A bill to reauthorize the Office of Special Counsel, and for other purposes.
Office of Special Counsel Reauthorization Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Johnson with amendments. With written report No. 115-74.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 93.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
The committee amendments agreed to by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with amendments by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
